name: Big Bud
description: Developed in the USA before being brought to the Netherlands in the 1980s to survive the War on Drugs, Big Bud is a legend among growers for its high yields in the garden. Preserved to this day by Dutch breeder Sensi Seeds, this indica produces massive buds with very few leaves, unmatched by any other cannabis variety. With an earthy and spicy aroma, Big Bud delivers deeply relaxing full-body effects true to its indica lineage.
descriptionPlain: Developed in the USA before being brought to the Netherlands in the 1980s to survive the War on Drugs, Big Bud is a legend among growers for its high yields in the garden. Preserved to this day by Dutch breeder Sensi Seeds, this indica produces massive buds with very few leaves, unmatched by any other cannabis variety. With an earthy and spicy aroma, Big Bud delivers deeply relaxing full-body effects true to its indica lineage.

highlightedReviews.text:
First hit and bam I was back in early 90s Seattle. Loved this strain back then and love it even more now. I suffer from what I call "the mechanic" like insomnia! I've asked every dispensary to give me there "guaranteed" knock you out strain and none has worked for me. Not until I got my hands on good ole big bud. Great body buzz uplifting just basic sit on the couch relax and watch TV till you pass out smoke! It relaxed my body pain (fibro) and I felt like I was laying on a cloud. Best feeling I've had in a long time. 

I do consider myself a MJ snob but nothing like Big Bud for your basic relax kick back smoke!

I'll pick it off the bottom shelf every time!!!
Alright usual side effect gave me mad munchies however

articles.title: 6 New Strains Added to the Leafly Explorer
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly Explorer is currently sitting at over 600 entries and growing. We often add new strains and products to the Explorer, ensuring that our visitors continue to receive the most up-to-date information about popular strains and products that interest them. Here's a rundown of six cannabis strains we added recently. If you've tried any of them, leave a review on their strain details pages! 
1. Erez
Erez, a best-selling cannabis variety in Israel, is an indica-dominant strain developed by the company Tikun Olam.
Characteristics: 

70% indica
Treats sleep disorders, nausea, inflammation, indigestion, and pain

2. Flowerbomb Kush
Flowerbomb Kush by Green House Seeds is an indica-dominant hybrid bred by crossing Green Crack and OG Kush.
Characteristics:

70% indica
Invigorating cerebral effects
Fast-acting and long-lasting
Creative
Stimulates appetite
Earthy, pine, citrus, and spice aroma
A 2nd place winner of the Amsterdam Cannabis Cup

3. XXX 420
XXX 420 from Ontario, Canada is an indica cross between Sweet Tooth #3 and Chemo.
Characteristics:

Euphoric
Full-body relaxation
Took 5th place in the 2004 Cannabis Cup

4. Strawberry
Originally bred in the Netherlands, Strawberry is a mostly sativa cannabis strain with a pungent fruity scent and uplifting effects.
Characteristics:

Stress-relieving
Relaxing and comfortable
Fruity, berry aroma
Flowering time of 9 weeks

5. Jean Guy
Jean Guy is a sativa-dominant strain from Canada with intensely cerebral effects and a sour citrus smell.
Characteristics:

High THC content
Energizing and uplifting
Citrus, lime, and pine aroma
May treat fibromyalgia symptoms

6. BC Big Bud
A cousin to the indica-dominant Big Bud cannabis strain from Amsterdam, BC Big Bud is a mostly sativa hybrid with potent cerebral effects.

Popular strain in Canada
Balanced indica and sativa genetics
Fruity, citrus aroma
May treat pain and nausea
Large harvests
8-9 week flowering period

growInfo.growNotes:
Yields typically reach up to 550g/m²
	Branches may need to be tied to support bud weight
	Well suited for sea of green (SOG)
	Hydro medium recommended for higher yields
